name: Chicken Invaders 3
description: Chickens. For centuries we have oppressed them, grilling, roasting, stewing, and stuffing them in buns. The time has come for us to pay. Intergalactic chickens are invading Earth, seeking revenge for the oppression of their earthly brethren!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 170 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Abosolutely hilarious! Last time I played this was close to a decade ago, and it's still amazing!
this is literally the single greatest game i have ever played. ign best game of forever 10/10

I had this game as a kid on a Pentium machine about 10 years ago and it was addicting, starting with the 2nd installment in the series, I always loved the humor and the game play, fun to just shoot chickens for hours. Just found it on the steam store and picked it up, just for the memories.
